name: Grapple Night
description:
I don't know how these things happen, but apparently the King has taken the Princess again.

Your job, as the legendary Grapple Night, is to try to save her.

We're not quite sure how this works but we do know that you have to swing from towers, gather "Grapple Juice", and avoid falling off the end.

Is it a platformer? Ehh sort of, but let's just say you got the "legendary" from swinging.

Arrow keys, and special controls for mobile.
